entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 7 April 2023
